sourcesContent:
<template>
    
      <ProductsGridItem :products="products" />
    
</template>

<script>
import ProductsGridItem from '../components/ProductsGridItem.vue';
import {products} from '../fake-data.js';
export default{
    name: 'ProductsPage',
    data() {
      return {
        products
      }
    }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
  .grid-wrap {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: space-between;
    margin-top: 16px;
  }

  .product-item {
    align-items: center;
    border-radius: 8px;
    box-shadow: 0px 2px 5px #888;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    margin-bottom: 2%;
    padding: 20px;
    position: relative;
    width: 32%;
  }

  .product-name {
    margin-bottom: 0;
  }

  img {
    height: 200px;
    width: 200px;
  }

  a {
    width: 100%;
  }

  button {
    width: 100%;
  }
  li{
    list-style-type: none;
  }
</style>
